perm.password_model_1: If you want to be able to login from anywhere using only your password and account name, you can use this page to add new keys to your permissions. If you also want to remove the original keys, you can do so in the active/owner permissions tabs.

account.total_estimate: This is the estimated value of all your assets, including any hidden assets, open orders, debt and collateral. The estimate is done using only live blockchain data and may not be perfectly accurate.

user_issued_assets.cer_warning_2: Make sure your core exchange rate is higher than the market price, otherwise people will buy your token from the market and drain your fee pool via implicit arbitrage. The core exchange rate should be updated regularly to reflect market pricing of your asset.
user_issued_assets.conflict_feed: Cannot allow witnesses and committee members to provide feeds simultaneously
user_issued_assets.error_invalid: That asset may not be used
user_issued_assets.error_precision: That asset does not have the same precision as %(asset)s
user_issued_assets.error_too_deep: May not create a bitasset backed by a bitasset backed by a bitasset
user_issued_assets.feed_not_allowed_1: Cannot set feed producers on a witness- or committee-fed asset
user_issued_assets.feed_not_allowed_2: Please disable the flags called 'Allow witnesses to provide feeds' and 'Allow committee members to provide feeds' in order to allow manual definition of feed producers
user_issued_assets.invalid_backing_asset_change: You can't change the backing asset of an asset that has a non-zero current supply
user_issued_assets.invalid_market_pair: Preferred market pairing can not be the same market
user_issued_assets.invalid_permissions_change: You can't enable a permission for an asset that has a non-zero current supply
user_issued_assets.max_positive: Max supply should be a positive number
user_issued_assets.maximum_force_settlement_volume: Max force settle volume (percent of total supply per hour)

user_issued_assets.precision_warning: The number of decimals may not be changed after creation

user_issued_assets.too_many_feed: Number of feed producers exceeded the max allowed (%(max)s).

vesting.no_balances: This account {account} has no vesting balances
vesting.non_balance_messege: There are no available SILVER balances
vesting.credit_description: Here you can get a loan from the platform for your referral rewards. You get a loan at 100%, that is, for example, you take 100 CWD, and you will have to pay 200 CWD. Payments on the loan are made automatically from your referral rewards, that is, until all the debt is repaid, your referral rewards will be fully debited to the loan repayment account, and not to the westing balance. You can't pay off the loan ahead of time
vesting.1_3_6: Initial contribution of the Housing Cooperative
vesting.1_3_12: Car bonus CARBON of Asset Management Trust

errors.below: Your collateral ratio is below %(mr)s which is not allowed.
errors.below_info: Your position is below the required maintenance collateral ratio! Increasing collateral ratio is allowed, debt can only be decreased.
errors.below_ratio_mcr_update: Your collateral ratio is blow your original %(ocr)s. Only increased ratio is allowed on margin called orders
errors.close: Your collateral ratio is close to %(mr)s which means this position is in danger of being margin called if the price drops.
errors.increased_debt_on_margin_call: You increased your debt, which is not allowed when updating a margin called position

tooltip.chart_height: Define the height of the charts
tooltip.chart_reload: Changing this setting will reload the chart
tooltip.chart_tools: Shows/Hides the left and top toolbar, as well as the context menu. Tools are always hidden in tiny screen.
tooltip.chart_type: Switch between market depth and price charts, or disable charts
tooltip.chart_zoom: Allow chart zooming. Zooming is always disabled in tiny screen.
tooltip.decrease_chart_height: Decrease the height of the chart
tooltip.hide_function_buttons: Hide all buttons that can be managed within the personalize form
tooltip.increase_chart_height: Increase the height of the chart
tooltip.market_location: Which side to pin the vertical order book on. This will switch place with market panel
tooltip.order_book_grouping: Group orders which are close together by a defined percentage
tooltip.order_style: Use vertical order book to pin it to the side panel
tooltip.orderbook_auto_scroll: Auto scroll the order book to keep center as new orders come in. Disable to allow scrolling
tooltip.position_order_asset: Define the vertical order for the order form vs order book
tooltip.position_order_form: Define the horizontal order for the order form
tooltip.position_order_orders: Define the horizontal order for the order book
tooltip.reload: Changing this option will only affect after manually reloading
tooltip.reverse_order_book: Reverse order book to have buy orders on top
tooltip.single_colum_order_form: Enforce that Price, Quantity, Total, etc. are in one column (not floating)

exchange.settle_globally_settled_tooltip: This asset is globally settled. You can settle it instantly for the global settlement price (see exchange header or asset details)
exchange.settlement_hint: You are attempting to settle {long}. Here is a price break down of {market_link}:
exchange.worth_less_settlement_warning: Warning! You can get a better price by selling to {market_link}.
exchange.confirm_buy: Your order is %(diff)s times higher than the lowest ask, are you sure?
exchange.confirm_no_orders_buy: You are placing a buy order in a market with no open sell orders. Are you certain you wish to proceed?
exchange.confirm_no_orders_sell: You are placing a sell order in a market with no open buy orders. Are you certain you wish to proceed?
exchange.confirm_sell: Your order is %(diff)s times lower than the highest bid, are you sure?

collateral.bid_text: Unfortunately, %(asset)s is in Global Settlement. During this time it is possible to bid on the collateral in the Settlement Fund and the debt it covers. When the total outstanding debt is covered by bids, and the additional collateral of each bid plus its share from the settlement fund is greater than the MCR, the asset is automatically revived and a margin position is created for each bid.
collateral.remove_bid: A bid can be removed by placing a zero collateral bid.

fee_pool.claim_text: The asset issuer may claim any accumulated fees here.
fee_pool.fund_text: Anyone can add %(core)s to the fee pool balance using this form:
fee_pool.pool_text:
The fee pool is used to pay fees in %(core)s by converting the fee in %(asset)s to %(core)s. If the fee pool runs out of funds, fees may no longer be paid in %(asset)s and will default to %(core)s.

The core exchange rate is the price at which %(asset)s are converted to %(core)s.
fee_pool.title: Fee Pool

asset.feed_producer_text: Approved feed producers may publish a new feed using the form below:

settlement.gs_description: Unfortunately, this asset is in Global Settlement. During this time there is no delay in asset force settlements, which will be covered by the settlement funds at the fixed settlement price.
settlement.gs_included_on_revival: Bids will be included on revival sorted by their bid price until the whole debt is covered (last bid might be covered partially). Included bids will be converted into margin positions and receive the residual collateral such that the position reaches MCR from the settlement fund. Not included bids will be reimbursed.
settlement.gs_place_bid: click here to place a bid
settlement.gs_revive: Asset will be revived automatically if auto revive price (bids included) is greater than feed price or all debt is force settled
settlement.max_settle_volume: Max. settlement volume each maintenance period
settlement.title: Settlement

asset.title: Asset

whitelist.enable_flag: The whitelist flag must be enabled in order to set whitelist authorities

blocks.title: Blockchain
blocks.block_hash_title: Search by Block ID, TxID or account name

proposals.authority_depth_warning: This proposal may not get approved because this permission exceeds the maximum authority depth.
proposals.children_authority_depth_warning: This proposal may not get approved because a permission exceeds the maximum authority depth.
proposals.title: Proposed transactions

workers.create_text_1: In order to create your new worker, please fill in the form below. The worker will be created using your currently active account, which must already be a service account.
workers.create_text_2: Consider carefully the parameters you choose as they can not be changed once you've published your worker.
workers.date_text: The start date should be at least a week into the future in order to allow people the time to discover, evaluate and vote for your worker.
workers.name_text: The name of your worker should be short and descriptive, something like this: 'Worker Purpose - Account Name'
workers.pay_text: The daily pay defines how much you want to be paid per day and is defined in CWD. The current best practice is to define a salary in USD/CNY, and commit to burning whatever surplus you receive as a result of the CWD price increasing. As long as your worker is active and has sufficient votes to be above the refund worker, you will receive this daily salary.
workers.title: Worker name
workers.url_text: You should supply a website, github document or google doc that describes in more detail the purpose of the worker and how you intend to use the worker pay.
workers.vesting_text: The vesting period defines the number of days that worker earnings will vest before being fully claimable.

gamezone.contacts-text: To contact the seller, enter your contacts (email, phone, delivery address)
gamezone.heads-desc-01: In this game you play with other participants. You can place your bet or answer the bet of another player in the "Active bets" section. Winability is 50%. The commission of the platform with a win is 10%
gamezone.amount_error: The bet must be at least

matrix.ref_text: Your personal link for the invitation to the Matrix:

gamezone.set-total: How many tickets will be issued (maximum 5000 tickets)
gamezone.title: CrowdWiz Gamezone

assets.bit: bit%(asset)s is a derivative that tracks the real value of %(backed)s. It is 100%% decentralized, trustless and backed by collateral held by the blockchain in a smart contract.
assets.bitcny: bitCNY can be deposited or withdrawn 1:1 to real Yuan using a gateway service such as Magic Wallet. For more info, see https://www.magicw.net/

gatewayBTC.marketText1: You can top up your CROWD.BTC account
gatewayBTC.marketText2: You can exchange CROWD.BTC for CWD
gatewayBTC.title: Make a transfer to the specified BTC address
gatewayBTC.warning: Depending on the workload of the network, funds can be transfered up to several hours.

locked.action: Click to unlock your account to perform this action

incognito.warning: If you close your browser without backing up your wallet, you will lose this account permanently.

login.dropFile: Drop your backup file in this area or
login.supportWarning: Warning! You browser doesn't support some some file operations required to restore backup, we recommend you to use Chrome or Firefox browsers to restore your backup.

migration.announcement_1: In an effort to provide enhanced security for the web-based wallet, we are migrating it, effective immediately to the address below. Please be sure to update any bookmarks you may have.
migration.text_2: Please backup your wallet now and restore the backup file to %(wallet_url)s, which will be your new address for the web wallet. Thanks for your continued support.
migration.text_3: Please use %(wallet_url)s from now on, your existing credentials will let you login there as well.
migration.title: Notice

qrcode.input_message:
Please enter a password used to encrypt the QR code.
An empty password will show an unencrypted QR code.
qrcode.title: Private key QR code
qrcode.label: QR code

report.copyScreenshot: Right click in Image Preview -> Copy
report.explanatory_text_1: This report collects the last entries in the console log and takes a screenshot of the current view before the modal is opened. Click on either entry to see the details.
report.explanatory_text_2: Please report the issue you have found to GitHub:
report.explanatory_text_3: You can copy and paste (CTRL+V) the screenshot as well as the log entries directly into the issue content text area, pasting the screenshot also works in telegram chat.
report.explanatory_text_4: If your issue affects user security you might be eligible for a bounty. In that case do not report it publicly, but rather through:
report.title: Error report

withdraw.btc-text-1: In the note field, enter the address of the Bitcoin wallet to which you want to receive a transfer
withdraw.btc-text-2: At the moment, the rate of 1 CROWD.BTC = 1 BTC. The withdrawal gateway fee is 1% of the transfer amount, you also need to pay the internal commission of the CrowdWiz platform for the transfer
withdraw.no_BTC_balance: You do not have CROWD.BTC in your account, you can purchase them

notifications.account_permissions_update_warning: Setting your owner permissions like this will render your account permanently unusable. Please make sure you know what you're doing before modifying account authorities!
notifications.asset_issue_failure: Failed to issue the asset, probably due to an invalid amount being issued
notifications.exchange_enter_valid_values: Please enter a valid amount and price
notifications.exchange_insufficient_funds_to_place_ord: Insufficient funds to place order, you need at least%(amount)s %(symbol)s
notifications.exchange_unknown_error_place_order: Unknown error. Failed to place order for %(amount)s %(symbol)s
notifications.import_keys_already_imported: This wallet has already been imported
notifications.import_keys_error: Account %(account_name)s had a private key import error: %(error_msg)s
notifications.wallet_unlock_different_block_chain: This wallet was intended for a different block-chain; expecting %(expectedWalletId)s, but got %(actualWalletId)s

operation.asset_update_feed_producers: {account} updated the feed producers for the asset {asset}
operation.autorefund_p2p_order: Cancellation of order {p2p_order} and refund {amount} to account {refund_to} by timeout
operation.call_order_update: {account} changed {debtSymbol} debt by {debt} and collateral by {collateral}
operation.call_p2p_order: {p2p_gateway} confirmed the order {p2p_order} from {p2p_client} for the amount of {amount}
operation.create_p2p_adv: {p2p_gateway} created an exchange ad for {currency} in {geo}
operation.create_p2p_order: {p2p_client} created an exchange order for ad {p2p_adv} in the amount of {amount}
operation.lottery_goods_buy_ticket: {participant} bought a ticket in the raffle {lot_id}
operation.lottery_goods_confirm_delivery: {winner} confirmed receipt of a prize {lot_id} in the game Scoop
operation.lottery_goods_create_lot: {owner} put a lot {lot_id} in the game Scoop
operation.lottery_goods_loose: Ticket in the raffle {lot_id} did not play
operation.lottery_goods_send_contacts: {winner} sent his contacts in the raffle {lot_id}
operation.lottery_goods_win: {winner} won a prize in the raffle {lot_id}
operation.matrix_cell_filled: Player {cell_player} entered the room {matrix_room} of player {player} at level {matrix_level}
operation.matrix_open_room: {player} opened a room in matrix {matrix_id} at level {matrix_level} for {level_price}
operation.matrix_room_closed: {player} won the prize {level_reward} for closing room {matrix_room} at level {matrix_level}
operation.open_p2p_dispute: {account} opened a dispute on the order {p2p_order} with {defendant}
operation.reply_p2p_dispute: {account} reply to the dispute on order {p2p_order}
operation.resolve_p2p_dispute: {winner} won against {looser} in the dispute over the order {p2p_order}, the decision was made by {arbitr}
operation.witness_create: {account} was upgraded to become a witness
operation.worker_create: {account} created a worker proposal with daily pay of {pay}
operation.credit_system_get: {debitor} took a CrowdWiz loan in the amount of {credit_amount}
operation.credit_total_repay: {debitor} fully repaid the loan from {creditor} for the amount of {repay_amount}
operation.credit_repay: {debitor} fully repaid the loan from {creditor} in the amount of {repay_amount}
operation.credit_offer_create: {creditor} created a credit offer for the amount of {credit_amount}. Amount to be refunded {repay_amount}, minimum income of the borrower's structure {min_income}
operation.credit_offer_fill: {debitor} took a loan for the amount of {credit_amount} from {creditor} on the loan offer {credit_offer}
operation.pledge_offer_give_create: {creditor} offered {credit_amount} as collateral {pledge_amount} for {pledge_days} days. Amount to refund {repay_amount}
operation.pledge_offer_take_create: {debitor} offered to pawn {pledge_amount} for {credit_amount} for {pledge_days} days. Amount to refund {repay_amount}
operation.pledge_offer_cancel: {creator} has canceled the offer of pledge {pledge_offer}
operation.pledge_offer_fill: {debitor} and {creditor} entered into a pledge agreement for the amount of {credit_amount} secured by {pledge_amount} for {pledge_days} days. Amount to refund {repay_amount}
operation.pledge_offer_repay: {debitor} paid off the debt owed to {creditor} in the amount of {repay_amount} under the pledge agreement {pledge_offer}. Deposit {pledge_amount} returned
operation.pledge_offer_auto_repay: {Debitor} debt to {creditor} has expired under the pledge agreement {pledge_offer}, the pledge {pledge_amount} is transferred to {creditor2}
operation.poc_vote: {account} voted for 3 months {poc3_vote}, for 3 months {poc6_vote}, for 3 months {poc12_vote}
operation.poc_staking_referal: {referrer} get level {level} referral reward, at {reward} for staking of account {account}
operation.approved_transfer_create: Transfer with arbitration from {from} to {to} for the amount {amount} will be active until {expiration}, the arbitrator {arbitr}
operation.approved_transfer_approve: {from} confirmed the transfer {ato} for {to} for the amount {amount}
operation.approved_transfer_cancel: Transfer {ato} from {from} to {to} for the amount {amount} canceled after the expiration of the activity period
operation.approved_transfer_open_dispute: {to} opened a dispute over the transfer {ato} for the amount of {amount} with {from}, the arbitrator {arbitr}
operation.approved_transfer_resolve_dispute: The arbitrator {arbitr} decided the dispute {ato} between {from} and {to} for the amount of {amount} in favor of {winner}
operation.gr_vote: {player} voted for the new parameters of the Great Race
operation.gr_assign_rank: According to the results of the Great Race stage, the {team} and the player {player} were assigned the rank {rank}
operation.gr_pay_rank_reward: At the end of the Great Race stage, the captain {captain} of the {team} team received a prize {amount} for reaching the rank {rank}
operation.gr_pay_top_reward: The {amount} prize for being in the TOP-3 of the {interval} interval of the Great Race was given to the captain {captain} of the team {team}
operation.gr_apostolos: For winning the Great Race, as part of the team {team}, the player {player} is appointed the Apostolos
operation.gr_range_bet_true: {bettor} bet {bet} that the {team} will take a place from {lower_rank} to {upper_rank}
operation.gr_range_bet_false: {bettor} bet {bet} that the {team} will not take the place from {lower_rank} to {upper_rank}
operation.gr_team_bet: {bettor} bet {bet} that {winner} will win in the competition between teams {team1} and {team2}
operation.gr_range_bet_win_true: {bettor} bet {bettor_part} on the fact that {team} will take a place from {lower_rank} to {upper_rank} and win {reward}. Total bets for the amount of {total_bets}, including winning {total_wins}
operation.gr_range_bet_win_false: {bettor} bet {bettor_part} that {team} will not take the place from {lower_rank} to {upper_rank} and won {reward}. Total bets for the amount of {total_bets}, including winning {total_wins}
operation.gr_range_bet_loose_true: {bettor} made a bet that {team} will take a place from {lower_rank} to {upper_rank} and lost
operation.gr_range_bet_loose_false: {bettor} made a bet that {team} will not take the place from {lower_rank} to {upper_rank} and lost
operation.gr_team_bet_win: The {bettor} bet {bettor_part} on the fact that, in the competition between the teams {team1} and {team2}, the {winner} will win and the {reward}. Total bets for the amount of {total_bets}, including winning {total_wins}
operation.gr_team_bet_loose: {bettor} made a bet that, in the competition between teams {team1} and {team2}. The winning team is {winner}
operation.gr_range_bet_cancel_true: Refunds from {bettor} for the amount of {payback} if {team} will rank from {lower_rank} to {upper_rank}
operation.gr_range_bet_cancel_false: Refunds from {bettor} for the amount of {payback} on the fact that {team} {result} (not) takes place from {lower_rank} to {upper_rank}
operation.gr_team_bet_cancel: Refunds from {bettor} for the amount of {payback} that {winner} wins in the competition between {team1} and {team2}

tooltip.borrow: Borrow %(asset)s from the network. This creates a smart contract that locks your collateral until you either modify the position or a margin call is required.
tooltip.borrow_disabled: %(asset)s is in global settlement. Margin positions can't be created until it is revived. See asset details page for more information
tooltip.buy_min: You will receive at minimum this amount. If there are matching orders with a cheaper price than you specified, you will receive more than this amount.
tooltip.call_limit: This is the call price of the least collateralized margin position in the market.
tooltip.call_price: This is the call price of the position. If the feed price goes below the call price, the position will be margin called.
tooltip.close_position: Click here to close your position. You will need to have at least %(amount)s %(asset)s in order to do so.
tooltip.coll_ratio: The collateral ratio of the position is COLLATERAL * FEED PRICE / DEBT.
tooltip.copy_password: Click here to copy the password to your clipboard
tooltip.copy_tip: Click here to copy the text to your clipboard
tooltip.cr_danger: This position is currently being margin called. Consider adding collateral to bring the collateral ratio above %(mr)s or closing the position.
tooltip.cr_warning: This position has a low level of collateral, and will get margin called if the collateral ratio drops below %(mr)s. Consider adding collateral or closing the position.
tooltip.feed_price: This is the current external feed price
tooltip.filter_ops: Use this list to filter your history by operation type.
tooltip.gateway: Gateways provide IOUs on the CrowdWiz Blockchain that are backed by the real asset
tooltip.generate: The generated password was created locally in your browser. No one else has access to it. Save your password in a safe place
tooltip.global_settle: This asset is globally settled. Settling it will let you convert your holdings of %(asset)s to %(backingAsset)s instantly, at the global settlement price (visible in exchange header or asset details page).
tooltip.global_settle_price: This is the price at which settle orders will execute. This asset is globally settled, thus settlement orders will execute instantly
tooltip.lack_funds: There is not enough funds to perform the operation
tooltip.legacy_explanation: Hides proposals that are duplicates, spam or have been started but not active for longer than 2 months.
tooltip.login:
This %(wallet_name)s wallet does not offer a traditional login but instead simply locks or unlocks a wallet that is only stored locally in your browser.

Whenever you close the wallet it will be locked and you will effectively be logged out.
tooltip.login_required: Please login to the selected account to perform this action
tooltip.margin_price: This is the maximum price that a margin called position can be made to pay. It is also called the Squeeze Price.
tooltip.market_fee: The owner of %(asset)s charges a market fee of %(percent)s for buy orders. This fee will be subtracted from the amount you receive when your order fills, it is not paid when placing an order.
tooltip.memo_tip: Memos are optional. You may include any message in the memo field
tooltip.no_groups_available: No groupings available using this API server
tooltip.no_price: There's no recent price available for this asset that can be used to estimate its value.
tooltip.nodes_popup: Click here to open the access settings popup that allows you to switch nodes if necessary
tooltip.propose_scam: This proposal was created by a known scammer or from someone that you blacklisted!
tooltip.propose_unknown: This proposal was created by or targets an unknown account (not in contacts or whitelist). Beware of scam attempts and carefully check the contained operations.
tooltip.proxy_remove: You have a proxy set, to remove it simply clear this input field
tooltip.proxy_search: Search for an account to be used as your proxy for voting
tooltip.settle: Settling will let you convert your holdings of %(asset)s to %(backingAsset)s after a delay of %(settleDelay)s hours, at a price equal to the feed price at that time.
tooltip.settle_price: This is the price at which settle orders will execute.
tooltip.show_block: Click here to show block #%(block)s where this transaction occurred.
tooltip.target_collateral_ratio:
Setting a Target Collateral Ratio (TCR) will allow the blockchain to automatically sell the required amount of your collateral in order to keep your collateral ratio at or above your defined TCR when the value of your collateral decreases.

To frequently sell small amounts, set a low target (eg. < 2)

To sell larger amounts infrequently, set a high target (eg. > 3)
tooltip.update_position: Click here to update your position. You may at any time change the debt and/or collateral levels of your position.

wallet.backup_explain: Clicking on the button below will generate a backup file with a .bin extension. This file is encrypted with your wallet password, and contains all the private keys for your accounts. It can be used to restore your wallet, or move it to a different computer/browser.
wallet.backup_new_account: Congratulations, you've just created a new account on the %(wallet_name)s exchange powered by the CrowdWiz blockchain! It is strongly recommended that you make a backup of your wallet now. Without a backup there is no way to restore your account if something happens to your computer.
wallet.backup_warning: It appears that your private key files are not backed up. For security reasons we recommend users do not log in without backing up their private keys.
wallet.brainkey_backed_up: This brainkey was last backed up
wallet.brainkey_not_backed_up: This brainkey has never been backed up
wallet.brainkey_reset_success: Sequence reset. In order to regenerate your private keys from the wallet brain key, refresh your browser then unlock the wallet.
wallet.brainkey_seq_reset_text:
Use this to reset the sequence counter used to derive private keys from the wallet brainkey.
It can be used to force a regeneration of private keys from your wallet brain key.
wallet.brainkey_w1: To complete your backup, print this out, or write it down.
wallet.brainkey_w2: Anyone with access to your recovery key will
wallet.brainkey_w3: have access to funds within this local wallet.
wallet.change_backup: Now that you've changed your password, we highly recommend making a new backup.
wallet.claim_later: Once you've imported the keys, you can claim these balances to an account of your choosing.
wallet.confirm_error: The confirmation does not match the password
wallet.create_account_text: The account name you choose needs to be unique, as it will be registered publicly on the blockchain and will be your identifer for any transactions you make.
wallet.create_importkeys_text: In order to import keys, you first need to create a local wallet to contain the keys. Complete the dialog below to create a new local wallet.
wallet.create_text: The %(wallet_name)s local wallet is stored in your browser, it is not stored in the cloud. A wallet can contain multiple accounts and can be easily transferred between browsers and computers using a backup file.
wallet.create_w_a: Create a local wallet containing an account
wallet.delete_confirm_line3: This action CANNOT be undone, and if you do not have a backup this local wallet will be gone.
wallet.dont_ask_for_backup: Don't ask me to back up again
wallet.first_account_paid: Since this is your first account, a faucet will pay the registration fee for you.
wallet.has_wallet: When you create your first %(wallet_name)s account, a %(wallet_name)s local wallet will be automatically created as well and stored in your browser. This local wallet is encrypted with your password, and will contain any private keys belonging to your accounts. It is important that you take the time to backup this wallet once created!
wallet.import_backup_choose: Please select your backup file in the dialog below. This is completely safe as the file is not uploaded anywhere and never leaves your browser.
wallet.import_pass_match: Password matches. Decrypting the backup now...
wallet.local_switch: Local wallet detected matching the given password, switching to local wallet mode
wallet.must_be_ltm: The fee paying account must be a service account to perform that operation.
wallet.name: Local Wallet Name
wallet.need_backup: This local wallet needs a backup
wallet.never_backed_up: This local wallet has never been backed up, you should create a backup now!
wallet.no_wallet: You do not have a local wallet yet?
wallet.not_first_account: Since you already have an account, you will need to pay for this new account yourself. In order to do so, your account needs to have service account, which can be bought in the account page.
wallet.ok_done: OK, take me to the dashboard
wallet.pass_length: The password must contain at least %(minLength)s characters. Ideally you should use 20 or more, and a combination of numbers, special characters and letters.
wallet.password_crucial: It is extremely important that you take the time to write down your password now, using the password manager, on paper, or somewhere else. If You lose or forget this password, your account will be lost. we cannot help you get it back.
wallet.password_lose_warning: IMPORTANT: If you forget your password, You will not be able to access your account. We can't reset or restore your password! Make sure that you have saved your password securely!
wallet.password_model_1: The cloud wallet uses a password in combination with your account name to generate your private keys on the fly. It restricts you to only logging in with one account at a time, in return for ease of use and convenience.
wallet.password_model_2: The cloud wallet lets you login to your wallet from anywhere using only your account name and password, but your password is vulnerable to brute-force attacks which means it is important to use a very long password, ideally 20+ characters!
wallet.paste_private: Paste private keys here (Wallet Import Format - WIF)
wallet.pwd4brainkey: Enter your password to show your brainkey
wallet.remember_me_explanation: Turn 'Remember Me' off to disable remembering your account name and other personal settings.
wallet.tips_explore: Now that you've successfully created an account and downloaded the backup, it's time to get started. Click on one of the links below to start exploring.
wallet.tips_header: You can also find these same links in the top menu, and in the drop-down menu next to your account name.
wallet.tips_login: IMPORTANT: There is no login/logout functionality here, you merely unlock your wallet when you wish to make a transaction.
wallet.title: Wallet
wallet.unclaimed: Unclaimed balances belonging to these keys
wallet.understand_1: I understand that no one can recover my password if I lose or forget it
wallet.understand_2: I have written down or otherwise stored my password
wallet.understand_3: I understand that I will lose access to my funds if I lose my password
wallet.wallet_browser: Your Web Browser is your Wallet
wallet.wallet_crucial: Your local wallet is only stored in your browser, so it is crucial that you create a backup that will enable you to recover your wallet if the data in your browser is lost! No one else can restore your account if you lose your backup.
wallet.wallet_exist: A local wallet called that already exists, please choose a new name
wallet.wallet_lose_warning: IMPORTANT: If you lose your local wallet or your pass phrase you will be unable to access any of your funds again. Make sure you store the backup somewhere safe, and memorize or write down your password!
wallet.wallet_move: This backup file can also be used to move your local wallet to different computers or different browsers. In order to restore your local wallet using this backup you will also need your password!

staking.title: Mining Proof of Crowd
staking.description: Here you can transfer CWD to staking for 3, 6 or 12 months. The profit depends on the term of the stak. If you still have SILVER tokens, you can exchange it for CWD
staking.description_link: on the "Silver / CWD Exchange" tab in the "My contract" section
staking.amount_error: The amount must be at least
staking.deposit_text_01: Staking for 3 months. Two vesting balances are created, one with the Staking body, and the other with percent. Vesting balance with the body becomes available after 90 days, and the percentages become available evenly every 5 seconds for 90 days
staking.deposit_text_02: Staking for 6 months. One vesting balance is created for the amount of the Staking body plus percent. Vesting balance with the body becomes available after 180 days, that is, the Staking amount along with percent is frozen for 180 days
staking.deposit_text_03: Staking for 12 month. One westing balance is created for the amount of the Staking body plus percent. The balance becomes available evenly every 5 seconds for 365 days

dex_index.option_description: %(optionType)s Option for %(optionQuote)s asset. Expiration date %(expiration)s. Strike price %(strikePrice)s %(optionBase)s for 1 %(optionQuote)s.

trade_pair_selection.description: Form your trading pair to work on the exchange

exchange.take_descripiton_text: In the Pledge amount field, specify which asset and how much of it you are willing to leave as collateral (it will be frozen on the smart contract at the moment when someone responds to your request). In the Credit amount field, specify how much and what asset you want to receive, and in the Repay amount field, specify how much and what asset you are ready to return. Also specify the number of days during which you agree to pay the amount to be refunded, otherwise your deposit will go to the lender
exchange.give_descripiton_text: In the Pledge amount field, specify which asset and how much of it you are willing to take as collateral (it will be frozen on the smart contract at the moment when someone responds to your request). In the payment Amount field, specify how much and what asset you are willing to give (this amount will be transferred to the pledger's account from your account), and in The amount to be paid field, specify how much and what asset you want to receive. Also specify in days how long you are giving the funds as collateral. After this period you will receive either a refund amount or a pledge amount
exchange.repay_period: Specify the period for which the debt should be paid (in days)
exchange.title: Create an offer

crowd_pledge.no_archive_pledges: You have no activated offers yet
crowd_pledge.title: Pledge offers

proof_of_crowd.description_01: Proof of Crowd staking is a modified Crypto Staking algorithm using the Crowd Wisdom mechanism. Its essence is that any user of the platform can freeze part of their CWD assets, thus temporarily withdrawing them from circulation. As the CWD becomes less freely available, this increases the value of the asset at the moment. For the fact that users freeze their assets, the system pays them a reward in CWD. The key feature of this staking method is that the amount of remuneration is determined by the community using regular voting using the Crowd Wisdom method. On this tab, you can vote for staking percentages for 3, 6, and 12 months. You can only vote once per vote. Only accounts that have previously used staking are allowed to vote.
proof_of_crowd.description_02: Voting is carried out using CWD - you send as a vote the amount of CWD that you would like to receive as a percentage of the Deposit for the selected staking period. When voting, you should try to think in a balanced way, determine the percentage for which you would be interested in freezing your CWD, but at the same time understand that too high percentages can negatively affect the activity of the entire platform and the community, since there will be too much CWD, and this can lead to a decrease in its value. After voting, all votes for each staking period will be processed as follows: 10% of the highest and 10% of the lowest interest rates will be excluded from the calculations, and the arithmetic average will be calculated from the remaining votes. This result will be accepted as the interest rate for the next quarter.
proof_of_crowd.description_04: Regardless of whether you participated in the voting or not, new staking percentages will be activated for all platform participants. The vote will not affect existing vesting balances, including SILVER, in any way.
proof_of_crowd.form_info: To vote, at least one of the fields must be greater than zero
proof_of_crowd.has_voted: Thank you! Your vote is accepted

finance_dashboard.pledge_btn: Give or take funds as pledge

verification_word.description_text: The verification word is necessary to protect against phishing sites. Scammers can't know your verification word, so it is stored in your device's browser. Therefore, if the verification word does not match the one you set, it means that you are on a phishing site. ATTENTION! do not enter your password on this site. The verification word is set for a specific device, so you will need to set it separately on your computer and your mobile device
verification_word.none_verification: The verification word is not set. Make sure that You are on the site

messages.range: The field should be in range from %(min)s to %(max)s
messages.max: The field should be less than %(max)s
messages.oneOf: The field should be one of: %(list)s

code_block.title: Open source and API
code_block.description: CrowdWiz blockchain is fully open source platform. You can easily build your own blockchain node from sources and work with it, or you may connect to the public node with a websocket-based API. CrowdWiz blockchain has a Python library to work with API, but you can use any language you want
code_block.tab_05: Get information from blockchain with CURL

footer.description: is an open source decentralized CrowdWiz-blockchain driven platform that uses Wisdom of the Crowd phenomenon for decision making and self-governing

great_race.tooltip_stage1: The first stage of the Great Race lasts 13 weeks, begins with the starting week, then there is a three-week stage of the race, then a week of rest, then race-rest-race and the final week of the first stage begins. There are 4 different types of intervals in total.
great_race.tooltip_stage2: The second stage also lasts 13 weeks and it repeats the same intervals as in the first stage, except for the Finish

stage_name.waiting: The race is about to start

my_team.my_team_intro: You can create a team and invite up to 11 members to it. Read more about team management in the Grand Race rules.
my_team.logo_text: The image must be square, not over 200kb
my_team.team_info: Warning! Once the command has been created, the name, description and logo cannot be changed!
my_team.modal_ivite_title: Invite a person to the team
my_team.non_create_text: You can only create a team during the first week of the Great Race. You can join another team

gr_bets.title: Tote
gr_bets.rules_text:
Bets are accepted only on the first 10 days of each race interval. At the end of the racing interval, the winners are determined in each bet, and the prize fund is divided among the winners in the proportion in which they were contributed from the bet. For example:
There was a bet that team1 will be higher than team2, user1 bet 100 CWD on team1, user2 bet another 200 CWD on team1, and user3 bet on 300 CWD for team 2 to win.
Team 1 won, and users1 and user2 shared the prize pool: 100 + 200 + 300 = 600 , user1 received: 600 / (100 + 200) * 100 = 200 CWD, and user2 got 600 / (100 + 200) * 200 = 400 CWD.
gr_bets.no_bet_text: There are no bets yet. Place your bets
gr_bets.no_bet_interval: There are no bets in this range.
gr_bets.no_bet_inreval: You cannot place bets now. You will be able to place your bets during the game intervals: Race 1, Race 2, Race 3, Race 4, Race 5 and Race 6

bet_modal.team_placeholder: Enter the name of the team
bet_modal.range_info_text: where the team will be in the ranking, (for example, from 1 to 5 or from 7 to 100 or even from 3 to 3)

address_book.intro_text: On this page you can find accounts, view their activity, structure, dex ads and much more. You can add accounts that you interact with frequently to your address book. This list is stored in your device's browser and is visible only to you. If you want to transfer a list of contacts from one device to another, click the Export button, in response you will receive a link (it will be valid for 24 hours), which can be opened on a new device by clicking the Import button. So your contacts will always be at hand
